metadata.title: CVE-2017-0309 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
All versions of NVIDIA GPU Display Driver contain a vulnerability in thekernel mode layer handler where multiple integer overflows may causeimproper memory allocation leading to a denial of service or potentialescalation of privileges.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-0309` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcuda1-304 - 304.135-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
libcuda1-304-updates - 304.135-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
